lead_paragraph: An article on Monday about the Washington Nationals’ first game in their new stadium referred incorrectly in some editions to Bob Feller and Honus Wagner, who are among former ballplayers featured on outsized photographs in the stadium’s corridors. Feller and Wagner are part of the Nationals’ salute to Hall of Famers from other cities; they never played for the Washington Senators. (Feller played for the Cleveland Indians, and Wagner mostly for the Pittsburgh Pirates.).
